snippet: Webster T. Trenchard, the director of college guidance at The Loomis Chaffee School in Windsor, Conn., advises seniors to "channel your inner Goldilocks and try to find the academic schedule that is just right."
abstract: Webster T. Trenchard, the director of college guidance at The Loomis Chaffee School in Windsor, Conn., advises seniors to "channel your inner Goldilocks and try to find the academic schedule that is just right."

headline.main: Counselor's Calendar | September Checklist for Seniors
